channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: The Michelin Guide honors three cheesesteak joints in Philadelphia
item.description: Some Philadelphians are cheesed off at the Michelin restaurant ratings team for an honor bestowed on some local cheesesteak restaurants.
item.content:encoded: Some Philadelphians are cheesed off at the Michelin restaurant ratings team for an honor bestowed on some local cheesesteak restaurants.
item.dc:creator: Buffy Gorrilla

item.title: The 2026 World Cup draw lays out the summer tournament
item.description: Countries with teams that qualified for the FIFA World Cup 2026 now know who they'll play their opening games against after Friday's draw in Washington, D.C. A record number of teams will compete.
item.content:encoded: Countries with teams that qualified for the FIFA World Cup 2026 now know who they'll play their opening games against after Friday's draw in Washington, D.C. A record number of teams will compete.
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: Here's what the Netflix-Warner Brothers deal means for consumers
item.description: News that Netflix plans to buy Warner Bros. in a massive deal is raising lots of questions -- including for consumers.
item.content:encoded: News that Netflix plans to buy Warner Bros. in a massive deal is raising lots of questions -- including for consumers.
item.dc:creator: Eric Deggans

item.title: Podcaster and author Mel Robbins opens up about her early failures
item.description: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Podcaster and author Mel Robbins opens up about her early failures.
item.content:encoded: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Podcaster and author Mel Robbins opens up about her early failures.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Martin

item.title: Netflix announces deal to acquire Warner Brothers Discovery
item.description: Streaming giant Netflix said it's buying Warner Bros. Discovery in a deal that would create a global entertainment behemoth. CNN and other cable channels Warner Bros. owns are not part of the deal.
item.content:encoded: Streaming giant Netflix said it's buying Warner Bros. Discovery in a deal that would create a global entertainment behemoth. CNN and other cable channels Warner Bros. owns are not part of the deal.
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: NPR's history podcast Throughline examines the roots of Sudan's civil war
item.description: Sudan has been at the center of a deadly and brutal war since April of 2023. Over 4 million people have fled the country since war broke out and at least 40,000 have been killed.
item.content:encoded: Sudan has been at the center of a deadly and brutal war since April of 2023. Over 4 million people have fled the country since war broke out and at least 40,000 have been killed.
item.dc:creator: Rund Abdelfatah

item.title: What to know about Admiral Bradley, who oversaw controversial boat strikes
item.description: As Congress raises questions about the legality of U.S. military boat strikes in the Caribbean, the spotlight is falling on Admiral Mitch Bradley, the commander of U.S. Special Operations Command.
item.content:encoded: As Congress raises questions about the legality of U.S. military boat strikes in the Caribbean, the spotlight is falling on Admiral Mitch Bradley, the commander of U.S. Special Operations Command.
item.dc:creator: Saige Miller

item.title: Christmas season arrives on the pop charts
item.description: The calendar has turned to December, and jingle bells have arrived at the top of the charts, led, as usual, by Mariah, Wham and Brenda Lee.
item.content:encoded: The calendar has turned to December, and jingle bells have arrived at the top of the charts, led, as usual, by Mariah, Wham and Brenda Lee.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Thompson

item.title: The immigration crackdown in Charlotte seems to be over, but the community is struggling
item.description: The Border Patrol's aggressive immigration operation in Charlotte, N.C., took the city by surprise. It lasted about a week, but immigrants and other residents say their city won't ever be the same.
item.content:encoded: The Border Patrol's aggressive immigration operation in Charlotte, N.C., took the city by surprise. It lasted about a week, but immigrants and other residents say their city won't ever be the same.
item.dc:creator: Adrian Florido

item.title: A recap of the two-day meeting of vaccine advisers to the CDC
item.description: Vaccine advisers to the CDC took action on vaccination of newborns against hepatitis B and questioned the overall childhood vaccination schedule and ingredients that boost some vaccines' potency.
item.content:encoded: Vaccine advisers to the CDC took action on vaccination of newborns against hepatitis B and questioned the overall childhood vaccination schedule and ingredients that boost some vaccines' potency.
item.dc:creator: Pien Huang
